column4: honestly i dont know video cards, just know how to get xserver running on most unix and linux os
put it this way, when i run the screensavor it is real slow and laggy...
but i do get full screen res, and my desktop is wider than the screen, another thing i do not like
so has anyone seen why those controlers do not work in ati catalyst control center?
i used this bin to load the ati driver:   ati-driver-installer-8-3-x86.x86_64.run
fired up Xserver with xorg.conf, it worked fine, good res, but screensavors are the test,,, opengl one's do not work, very slow laggy
please don't.  ubuntu packages nvidia and ati drivers.
don't use downloads off of ati.com.  Use ubuntu packages.
the ubuntu packages are under package management.  What you intsalled is not.
regardless of hardware, please use ubuntu packages rather than downloads off of ati.com, nvidia.com, or any other place.
you asked what hardware.  I answered.
dont get personal,i have been askin the same question for an hour, and i havent blow up yet
heed the warning, or next time it'll be a ban
